BasicInfo.short: Silexica offers software development tools for to improve the performance and utilization of automated multicore programming.

Products.name: SLX Mapper
Products.description: Map a process network to a heterogenous multi-core platform

Products.name: SLX Parallelizer
Products.description: SLX Parallelizer receives sequential C code as input and semi-automatically turns it into a parallel process network implementation.

Products.name: SLX Explorer
Products.description: find the best hardware platform for your software
